text.style: text-anchor: middle; font-family: Khand; font-size: 21.945px; fill: rgb(17, 17, 17); stroke: rgb(136, 136, 136); stroke-width: 0.5pt;
text-anchor: middle; font-family: Khand; font-size: 21.945px; fill: rgb(17, 17, 17); stroke: rgb(136, 136, 136); stroke-width: 0.5pt;
text-anchor: middle; font-family: Khand; font-size: 21.945px; fill: rgb(17, 17, 17); stroke: rgb(136, 136, 136); stroke-width: 0.5pt;
font-family: Gochi Hand; font-size: 18.6533px; text-anchor: start; fill: rgb(17, 68, 51); stroke: rgb(34, 136, 102);
text-anchor: start; font-family: Gochi Hand; font-size: 18.6533px; fill: rgb(17, 68, 51); stroke: rgb(34, 136, 102); stroke-width: 0.05pt;
text.tspan: -- Children of Gaia gift
The Child may stop any Weaver-born weapons from working within
the range of his voice. A dove-spirit teaches this Gift.
-- System
The Garou shouts an ancient word of power and grace and spends a
Gnosis point. The player rolls Willpower against a difficulty of
highest Willpower of any armed individual within earshot. For each
success, all manufactured weapons will not function for one turn. This
includes guns, crossbows, flame-throwers, and even knives and
swords, which refuse to cut. Natural weapons (such as claws) and
natural objects appropriated as weapons (such as rocks or
naturally-fallen tree limbs) are unaffected.

text.style: font-family: Gochi Hand; font-size: 18.6533px; text-anchor: start; fill: rgb(17, 68, 51); stroke: rgb(34, 136, 102);
text-anchor: start; font-family: Gochi Hand; font-size: 18.6533px; fill: rgb(17, 68, 51); stroke: rgb(34, 136, 102); stroke-width: 0.05pt;
text.tspan: -- Theurge gift
This Gift bestows understanding of the language of the spirit world,
permitting the Garou to clearly understand and speak with any
spirit he encounters. The Gift doesn’t influence spirits’ attitudes
toward the werewolf in any way, nor ensure that they have any
desire to communicate with him. Any spirit can teach it.
-- System
Once learned, this Gift allows the Garou to understand the
communication of spirits intuitively. Particularly alien spirits may be
difficult — or, in the case of many Banes, outright painful — to
understand.

text.style: font-family: Gochi Hand; font-size: 18.6533px; text-anchor: start; fill: rgb(17, 68, 51); stroke: rgb(34, 136, 102);
text-anchor: start; font-family: Gochi Hand; font-size: 18.6533px; fill: rgb(17, 68, 51); stroke: rgb(34, 136, 102); stroke-width: 0.05pt;
text.tspan: -- Homid gift
This Gift imbues a homid’s words with intrinsic credibility and
conviction, causing them to ring true to the ear and lay heavy on
the heart. An ancestor-spirit teaches this Gift.
-- System
The player rolls Charisma + Subterfuge (difficulty 7). Success lowers
the difficulty of all social rolls by one for the rest of the scene, and
allows successful rolls to have uncommonly strong impact (such as
changing long-held political views, or causing an addict to seriously
reconsider the course of his life).

text.style: text-anchor: start; font-family: Gochi Hand; font-size: 18.6533px; fill: rgb(17, 68, 51); stroke: rgb(34, 136, 102); stroke-width: 0.5pt;
text-anchor: end; font-family: Philosopher; font-size: 18.6533px; fill: rgb(34, 34, 34); stroke: rgb(136, 136, 136); stroke-width: 0.5pt;
text-anchor: end; font-family: Philosopher; font-size: 18.6533px; fill: rgb(34, 34, 34); stroke: rgb(136, 136, 136); stroke-width: 0.5pt;
text-anchor: start; font-family: Philosopher; font-size: 14.2643px; fill: rgb(34, 34, 34); stroke: rgb(136, 136, 136); stroke-width: 0.5pt;
text-anchor: end; font-family: Philosopher; font-size: 14.2643px; fill: rgb(34, 34, 34); stroke: rgb(136, 136, 136); stroke-width: 0.5pt;

g.text: WaWWoD Cross+Over Sheet WW20-29.09 ©2024, Red Fox Studios.
